Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Elston
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave., Ashland, Cortland, Elston and North Ave. due to street blockage near North Ave/Elston

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
